Update Announcer:
Recommended for adventurers who are level 80 or higher, the Chamber of Delusion is a new dimension discovered by the Pathfinders who studied Kamaroka.
Existing in dreamspace, it is reputed to be a place filled with monsters born of nightmares and chaos, commannded by Aenkinel, the Invader of Dreams.
Since the Chamber of Delusion does not physically exist in our world, you can only move there with the help of a Pathfinder.
Pathfinders are located in every village, so you should be able to easily find one.
